sent: there were six bids initially submitted for the summer olympics tokyo was ultimately elected as the host city at the th ioc session in buenos aires argentina on september bidding process the olympic bidding process begins with the submission of city application to the international olympic committee ioc by its national olympic committee noc and ends with the election of the host city by the members of the ioc during an ordinary session the process is governed by the olympic charter as stated in chapter rule since the process has consisted of two phases during the first phase which begins immediately after the bid submission deadline the applicant cities are required to answer questionnaire covering themes of importance to successful games organization this information allows the ioc to analyze the cities hosting capacities and the strengths and weaknesses of their plans following detailed study of the submitted questionnaires and ensuing reports the ioc executive board selects the cities that are qualified to proceed to the next phase the second phase is the true candidature stage the accepted applicant cities from now on referred to as candidate cities are required to submit second questionnaire in the form of an extended more detailed candidature file these files are carefully studied by the ioc evaluation commission group composed of ioc members representatives of international sport federations nocs athletes the international paralympic committee and international experts in various fields it is chaired by sir craig reedie the members of the evaluation commission then make four day inspection visits to each of the candidate cities where they check the proposed venues and are briefed about details of the themes covered in the candidature file the evaluation commission communicates the results of its inspections in report sent to the ioc members up to one month before the electing ioc session the ioc session in which host city is elected takes place in country that did not submit an application to stage the olympics the election is made by the assembled active ioc members excluding honorary and honor members each possessing one vote members from countries that have city taking part in the election cannot vote while the city is in the running the voting is conducted in succession of rounds until one bid achieves an absolute majority of votes if this does not happen in the first round the bid with the fewest votes is eliminated and another voting round begins in the case of tie for the lowest number of votes special runoff vote is carried out with the winner proceeding to the next round after each round the eliminated bid is announced following the announcement of the host city the successful bid delegation signs the host city contract with the ioc which delegates the of the games organisation to the city and respective noc bidding timeline the timeline of the host city selection process was approved by the international olympic committee ioc executive board as follows may ioc sent letters inviting the national olympic committees nocs to submit bids july and august ioc asked for nocs to submit letters regarding compliance with the world anti doping agency code by july the ioc also requested submissions of proposed dates if countries want to stage the games outside the normal period set by the ioc july to august the ioc responded to nocs on these points by the end of august september deadline to submit the names of cities interested in hosting the summer games september ioc confirmed that they had received six bids november ioc held an information seminar for applicants december ioc announced the drawing lots order of applicant cities february application files and guarantee letters submitted to the ioc may ioc executive board in quebec city decided which cities were to be approved as official candidate cities july august olympic games observers programme at the games of the xxx olympiad in london november olympic games debrief in rio de janeiro january candidature files submitted march ioc evaluation commission visited tokyo march ioc evaluation commission visited madrid march ioc evaluation commission visited istanbul june report of the ioc evaluation commission july candidate cities briefing to ioc members at extraordinary session in lausanne september election of the host city at th ioc session in buenos aires evaluation of applicant cities six cities were put forward by their respective national olympic committees nocs to apply to host the games initially but rome withdrew its bid shortly before the applicant files were due the bidding cities come from two continents europe and asia istanbul is considered to be located on the border between asia and europe in it will be twelve years since an asian city hosted the summer olympics beijing and eight years since european city hosted the summer olympics london out of the six bidders tokyo had previously hosted the summer olympic games in the other four bidders have made bids in the past it is the first time in years that no city in the americas bid to host the summer olympic games rio de janeiro was awarded the summer olympics baku and doha bid for the games but failed to become candidate cities while tokyo and madrid also bid for the games and became candidate cities table of scores given by the ioc working group to assess the quality and feasibility of the applicant cities criteria istanbul tokyo baku doha madrid min max min max min max min max min max games concept and competition venues olympic village international broadcast centre media press centre sports experience environment and meteorology accommodation transport medical services and doping control safety and security energy legal aspects customs immigration formalities government and public support finance and marketing final selection process the ioc voted to select the host city of the summer olympics on september at the th ioc session at the buenos aires hilton in buenos aires argentina an exhaustive ballot system was used no city won over of the votes in the first round and madrid and istanbul were tied for second place run off vote between these two cities was held to determine which would be eliminated in the final vote head to head contest between tokyo and istanbul tokyo was selected at buenos aires time utc by votes to votes bidding cities the candidate cities for the olympics were in order of drawing lots sunset in shinjuku shibuya at night view of the bosphorus in istanbul alcalá street and the metropolis building candidate cities city country national olympic committee result tokyo japanese olympic committee joc winner tokyo was selected by the japanese olympic committee on july and was confirmed as japan bidding city for the games hiroshima was considering making bid for the games but opted to pull out following poor public reaction to the bid as well as lack of funding tokyo hosted the summer olympics japan has also hosted the winter olympics in and which were organized in sapporo and nagano respectively japan previously co hosted the fifa world cup with south korea the final was held in yokohama near tokyo further japan hosted the fiba world championship in the gymnastics world championships were also held in tokyo japan will host the rugby world cup and two of the venues for the event are located in the greater tokyo area istanbul turkish olympic committee tmok first runner up istanbul was nominated on july at the rd ioc session and was confirmed as turkey bid on july istanbul hosted the uefa champions league final uefa cup final and fifa world cup in football the fiba world championship for men the euroleague final four in basketball the wta tour championships in tennis the fina world swimming championships and the iaaf world indoor championships in athletics istanbul will host the wta tour championships the fiba world championship for women and is considering bid for the summer olympics madrid spanish olympic committee coe second runner up madrid was nominated by the spanish olympic committee executive committee on june madrid bid was their third consecutive bid spain previously hosted the summer olympics at barcelona spain hosted the fifa world cup and the final was held in madrid it has also hosted the final of european champions league the final of europa league final of the fiba eurobasket several times eurohockey nations championship european judo championships uci road world championships european karate championships world taekwondo championships world cup in athletics cup european aquatics championships european nations cup fivb volleyball world league european athletics indoor championships uci mountain bike world cup every year wta tour championships spanish international badminton tournament every year world aquatics championships and several other spain hosted the fiba world championship and hosted the fiba basketball world cup the final match was held at the palacio de los deportes de la comunidad de madrid in madrid non selected applicant cities baku azerbaijan view of nizami street in baku it was announced at the september deadline for bidding that baku had submitted bid to host the olympics baku submitted their application file to the ioc on february the national assembly of azerbaijan voted to endorse the bid in february baku hosted the european games doha qatar on august doha announced that it was bidding for the games doha hosted the asian games and the pan arab games in qatar was selected to host the fifa world cup several stadiums will be located in doha the country also hosted the and afc asian cups cancelled bid rome italy view of vittorio emmanuele ii monument in rome rome was nominated by the italian national olympic committee on may italy capital city was chosen over venice as the country bid for the games rome previously hosted the summer olympics in and was chosen to host the summer olympics but was relocated to london due to the eruption of mount vesuvius it bid to host the games but lost to athens in the final round of voting rome hosted the world aquatics championships as well as the fifa world cup final italy previously hosted the winter olympics in turin and the winter olympics in cortina ampezzo italy will also host the winter olympics via joint bid between milan and cortina ampezzo however the rome municipal administration withdrew its support from the bid on the eve of the delivery of the application files stating that it would not be responsible use of money in italy current condition proposed bids which did not go to application the following cities proposed bidding however they did not bid or even formally announce their intentions to bid brisbane australia cairo egypt berlin germany budapest hungary delhi india nairobi kenya kuala lumpur malaysia guadalajara mexico casablanca morocco lisbon portugal the following cities proposed submitting bids but announced prior to the september deadline that they would not put forth bid the following list is in order of cancellation prague czech republic cancelled its bid because of the global financial crisis bucharest romania decided not to proceed with its bid because the city hall general counsellors believed the project would be unachievable busan south korea decided not to bid following pyeongchang successful bid for the winter olympics they are however planning to bid for the summer olympics paris france was eventually selected to host the olympic games as france pulled out of the bid following the defeat of annecy bid for the winter olympics will coincide with the th anniversary of the olympics which were held in the french capital dubai united arab emirates was considering bid for but decided to instead wait until toronto ontario canada had long considered bid for the summer olympics especially after their successful bid for the pan american games but announced on august that the idea will be dropped due to budgetary restrictions durban south africa was discussed as potential bid however it was announced on august that south africa would not put forth bid saint petersburg russia decided not to bid despite having discussed the plan with the head of the russian olympic committee they withdrew on august instead planning on bidding for either or multiple cities in the united states were interested in bidding but the usoc confirmed that the us would not bid citing an ongoing dispute with the ioc the ioc stated that it would like to have received bid for from the united states on august it was revealed that las vegas submitted bid to the ioc without usoc consent the ioc rejected the bid references external links applicant files baku doha istanbul madrid vol madrid vol rome tokyo candidature files istanbul madrid tokyo

five cities made the shortlist with their bids to host the summer olympics formally known as games of the xxviii olympiad which were awarded to athens on september the other shortlisted cities were rome cape town stockholm and buenos aires final selection in the first round of voting buenos aires and cape town tied with the lowest number of votes round two was therefore tie breaker round between the two cities with buenos aires being eliminated stockholm was the next city to be eliminated followed by cape town the final round saw athens receive enough votes to defeat rome and win the right to host the summer olympics official voting results athens was the leader in all rounds of voting except in round which was tie breaker due to first round tie between cape town and buenos aires cape town won that round over buenos aires before losing out in the th round host city election ballot results city country noc round run off round round round athens rome cape town stockholm buenos aires bidding cities candidate cities the colosseum one of rome most famous landmarks the acropolis of athens logolink city country national olympic committee result px athens hellenic olympic committee hoc winner the city of athens greece submitted bid for the games and won the election in the final round of voting defeating rome athens previously hosted the first modern olympic games in and bid for the summer olympics which were awarded to london but cancelled due to world war ii and the summer olympics athens campaign logo is represented by watercolor version of an olympic cauldron with the flame shaped as capital rome italian national olympic committee coni first runner up the city of rome italy submitted bid for the games and lost the election in the final round of voting being defeated by athens rome was previously awarded the summer olympics but the eruption of mount vesuvius forced the italians to return the games to the ioc and passed the honors to london it would have been the second time rome hosted the games after the summer olympics rome also bid for the the cancelled games and was recently candidate city for the summer olympics but withdrew its bid two years after rome lost their bid turin was awarded the winter olympics rome campaign logo depicts an stylized version of coloseum backgrounded by the sun cape town south african sports confederation and olympic committee sascoc second runner up the city of cape town south africa submitted bid for the games and received the third most votes tying with buenos aires in the first round of voting and winning the run off cape town never hosted the summer olympics or bid before it was africa first bid since alexandria egypt failed its bids to host the cancelled summer olympics and the summer olympics both of which were awarded to berlin had cape town won the rights to host the olympic games it would have been the first olympic games in the continent of africa south africa was awarded the fifa world cup on may and cape town was one of the host cities cape town campaign logo consists of an stylized map of africa colored with the colors of the olympic rings which is formed around the location of cape town in the south of the continent stockholm swedish olympic committee sok third runner up the city of stockholm sweden submitted bid for the games and was eliminated in the third round of voting stockholm previously hosted the summer olympics as well as co hosted the summer olympics with melbourne stockholm campaign logo depicts the statue man and pegasus located at millesgården just outside stockholm its hopes were ruined when sports arenas in stockholm and göteborg were damaged by explosive bombs and arson attacks by mats hinze px buenos aires argentine olympic committee coa fourth runner up the city of buenos aires argentina submitted bid for the games and was eliminated in run off against cape town since both cities tied in the first round of voting buenos aires never hosted the summer olympics but bid for the games to become the first south american olympic host city rio de janeiro hosted the summer olympics and became the first city in the continent to host the games buenos aires campaign logo displays an andean condor with open wings in blue recalling the argentine national colors and its flag buenos aires hosted the th ioc session on september and hosted the summer youth olympics applicant cities rio de janeiro brazil san juan puerto rico istanbul turkey lille france saint petersburg russia seville spain see also references

london hosted the olympic games in and the summer olympics made london the first city to have hosted the modern games of three olympiads london is the only city in the united kingdom to have ever hosted the olympics the united states is the only country to have hosted summer olympics on more occasions than the uk also london is the only city to have bid more than once and still hold record british participation in olympic events both as competitor and as host is the responsibility of the british olympic association summer olympics london olympics the summer olympics the games of the iv olympiad were the fifth modern olympic games and the third to be hosted outside of athens greece the international olympic committee considers them the fourth olympic games discounting the intercalated summer olympics the olympic games were scheduled to take place in rome but the eruption of mount vesuvius on april required the italian government to redirect funds away from the olympics the events took place between april and october with nations participating in events the british team easily topped the unofficial medal count finishing with three times as many medals as the second place united states summer olympics the summer olympics the games of the xiii olympiad were scheduled to be held in london awarded in they were however cancelled due to world war ii these games would have celebrated the th anniversary of the modern olympiad summer olympics the summer olympics the games of the xiv olympiad were the first to be held after world war ii with the summer olympics having been cancelled due to the war showing collective unity after the war nations competed in different events between july and august germany and japan were not invited to the games due to security reasons unlike the previous time the uk hosted the olympics the british athletes did not have high medal count finishing th in the unofficial medal count with only medals summer olympics the summer olympics the games of the xxx olympiad took place between july and august the london olympic bid was announced as the winner of the bidding process on july following unsuccessful bid attempts for previous olympics by manchester and birmingham team gb finished rd with gold medals and total medals representing their best medal haul since london first hosted the olympics in summer paralympics the summer paralympics were the fourteenth paralympics and took place between august and september at the summer olympics venues in london external links london olympic games official website london olympic games information portal commentary on olympic park

map of host cities and countries of the modern summer orange and winter blue olympics tap or hover over city to show its name this is list of host cities of the olympic games both summer and winter since the modern olympics began in since then summer and winter games have usually celebrated four year period known as an olympiad summer and winter games normally held in staggered even years there have been summer olympic games held in cities and winter olympic games held in cities in addition three summer and two winter editions of the games were scheduled to take place but later cancelled due to war berlin summer in tokyo helsinki summer and sapporo garmisch partenkirchen winter in and london summer and cortina winter in the intercalated olympics were officially sanctioned and held in athens however in the international olympic committee ioc decided to unrecognize the games the summer olympics in tokyo were postponed for the first time in olympics history to summer due to the covid pandemic with the winter olympics being held roughly six months later in beijing the youth olympic games are held every four years in staggered summer and winter events consistent with the current olympic games format though in reverse order with winter games held in leap years instead of summer games the first summer version was held in singapore from to august while the first winter version was held in innsbruck austria from to january five cities have been chosen by the ioc to host upcoming olympic games tokyo for the summer olympics beijing for the winter olympics paris for the summer olympics milan cortina for the winter olympics and los angeles for the summer olympics additional two cities have been chosen by the ioc to host upcoming youth olympic games dakar for the summer youth olympics and gangwon province for the winter youth olympics in beijing will become the first ever city that has held both the summer and the winter olympic games eleven cities will have hosted the olympic games more than once athens and summer olympics paris and summer olympics london and summer olympics st moritz and winter olympics lake placid and winter olympics los angeles and summer olympics cortina ampezzo and winter olympics innsbruck and winter olympics and winter youth olympics tokyo and summer olympics lillehammer winter olympics and winter youth olympics gangwon province pyeongchang winter olympics and winter youth olympics and beijing summer olympics and winter olympics stockholm hosted the summer olympics and the equestrian portion of the summer olympics london became the first city to have hosted three games with the summer olympics paris will become the second city to do this with the summer olympics followed by los angeles as the third in the united states has hosted total of eight olympic games more than any other country followed by france with five editions switzerland the united kingdom austria canada italy japan and germany have each hosted three games the games have primarily been hosted in the continents of europe editions and americas editions seven games have been hosted in asia and two have been hosted in oceania in singapore became southeast asia first olympic host city for the inaugural summer youth olympics while rio de janeiro became south america first olympic host city with the summer olympics followed by buenos aires with the summer youth olympics the summer youth olympics in dakar will become the first ever games to be held on the african continent other major geographic regions which have never hosted the olympics include the middle east central asia the indian subcontinent central america and the caribbean host cities are selected by the ioc membership usually seven years in advance the selection process lasts approximately two years in the first stage any city in the world may submit an application to become host city after months the executive board of the ioc decides which applicant cities will become official candidates as based on the recommendation of working group that reviews the applications in second stage the candidate cities are investigated thoroughly by an evaluation commission which then submits final short list of cities to be considered for selection the host city is then chosen by vote of the ioc session general meeting of ioc members olympic games host cities host cities for paris has hosted several olympiads and and will host in paris will be the second city in the modern games to have hosted three olympiads when paris hosts the summer olympics the other being london the french national olympic and sports committee oversees france interests in the olympics summer olympics paris summer olympics the summer olympics the games of the ii olympiad were the third modern olympics and the inaugural hosted outside of athens greece the international olympic committee considers them the second olympics discounting the intercalated summer olympics the summer olympics were held simultaneously with the world fair the events took place between may and october with nations participating in events the french team topped the unofficial medal count finishing with three times as many medals as the second place united states while fielding ten times as many athletes summer olympics the summer olympics the games of the viii olympiad were the second to be held after world war showing collective unity after the war nations competed in different events between may and july germany was not invited to the games due to security reasons unlike the previous time france hosted the olympics the french athletes did not have high medal count finishing rd in the unofficial medal count with only medals summer olympics the summer olympics the games of the xxxiii olympiad will take place from july to august the paris olympic bid was announced as the winner of the bidding process on september following unsuccessful bid attempts for previous olympiads summer paralympics the summer paralympics will be the seventeenth paralympics and will take place between august and september at the summer olympics venues in paris external links paris olympic games official website
